lead_paragraph: PIERREPONT--Molly (Mary Owings) Shriver, died May 13, 2016, just shy of her 101st birthday. She was the daughter of Mary Chatard Dugan and Joseph Nicholas Shriver of Baltimore, MD. Molly was predeceased by her husband, Rutherfurd Stuyvesant Pierrepont, Jr., and her eldest child Polly Pierrepont Perry. Her surviving children are Nathalie P. Comfort (William T.), Louise P. Muir (J. Dapray), Seth Low Pierrepont (Consuelo), and Rutherfurd Stuyvesant Pierrepont III (Virginia). She was the grandmother of 17 children and the great-grandmother to 20 more. Molly began her career as a Ford Agency model, went on to become an interior designer, and she co-founded the Hobe Sound shop "Cloud 900." Molly was a sportswoman who enjoyed golf into her 90s, and she was still playing bridge this year. Her friends and family are grateful to have enjoyed her fun and games for over a century, and we will remember her for her wit, beauty, and grace. 1/3
